title: Chroma Skin in season 6 ranked queue
body: Wow It seems I have lost the option to change my chroma skins in ranked queue this makes me sadder then {{champion:32}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey Rumpelstiltskin,

Thanks for the report! This issue will be resolved when patch 6.2 goes out!
Yea I can't select them either Rito pls fix
